parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.52</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a magazine to the turret. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret.

Note: you may create invalid combinations by using this function, for example by adding 20 grenades. When doing so, application behaviour is undefined. Since Arma 3  v1.55.133817 it is possible to set custom ammo count in added magazine. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''addMagazineTurret''' [magazineName, turretPath, ammoCount]</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [magazineName, turretPath]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> magazineName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> ammoCount (Optional): [[Number]] (''since Arma 3 v1.55.133817'') - required ammo count </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_tank [[addMagazineTurret]] ["SmokeLauncherMag",[0,0]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_tank [[addMagazineTurret]] ["20Rnd_120mmSABOT_M1A2",[0]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[addMagazineGlobal]], [[addMagazine]], [[loadMagazine]], [[addMagazines]], [[addMagazineCargo]], [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[addMagazinePool]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[addMagazineAmmoCargo]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[turretLocal]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
